parameters.description: ID of the page to retrieve blocks for

blocks.description: Array of blocks associated with the page

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of published blog posts for a specific site

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: ID of the site to retrieve blog posts for

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 25, max: 100)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default: updatedAt)

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (default: desc)

id.description: Unique identifier for the blog post

slug.description: URL-friendly identifier for the blog post

excerpt.description: Excerpt of the blog post content

featureImage.description: Feature image for the blog post

createdAt.description: Date and time when the post was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the post was last updated

publishedAt.description: Date and time when the post was published

siteId.description: ID of the site this post belongs to

items.description: Array of blog posts in the current page

total.description: Total number of published blog posts

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more pages after the current one

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there are previous pages before the current one

startCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the first item in the current page, if available

endCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the last item in the current page, if available

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong
Error message describing what went wrong
Error message describing what went wrong

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of bookings for a site with optional status filtering

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 25, max: 100)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by booking status

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: Site ID to fetch bookings for

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default: updatedAt)

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (default: desc)

total.description: Total number of bookings matching the query

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more pages after the current one

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there are previous pages before the current one

startCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the first item in the current page, if available

endCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the last item in the current page, if available

userId.description: ID of the user who created the booking, can be null

siteId.description: ID of the site where the booking was made, can be null

eventTypeId.description: ID of the event type for this booking, can be null

response.description: Custom response data associated with the booking, can be null

startTime.description: Start date and time of the booking

endTime.description: End date and time of the booking

attendees.description: List of attendees for the booking

location.description: Location where the booking will take place, can be null

createdAt.description: Date and time when the booking was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the booking was last updated

destinationCalendarId.description: ID of the destination calendar for this booking, can be null

cancellationReason.description: Reason for cancellation if the booking was cancelled, can be null

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection if the booking was rejected, can be null

rescheduledReason.description: Reason for rescheduling if the booking was rescheduled, can be null

rescheduled.description: Indicates if the booking has been rescheduled, can be null

fromReschedule.description: ID of the original booking if this is a rescheduled booking, can be null

recurringEventId.description: ID of the recurring event this booking belongs to, can be null

smsReminderNumber.description: Phone number for SMS reminders, can be null

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the booking, can be null

calendarEvent.description: Calendar event data associated with the booking, can be null

isRecorded.description: Indicates if the booking event will be recorded

title.description: Title of the booking, can be null

description.description: Description of the booking, can be null

source.description: Source of the booking (e.g., website, app), can be null

items.description: List of booking items in the current page

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong
Error message describing what went wrong

get.description: Retrieves a sample of bookings with basic information

200.description: Array of simplified bookings with basic information

schema.description: Array of simplified bookings with basic information

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 25, max: 100)

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: Filter sites by workspace ID

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filter sites by status

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default: updatedAt)

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (default: desc)

description.description: Description of the site, can be null

slug.description: URL-friendly identifier for the site

createdAt.description: Date and time when the site was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the site was last updated

overridePlan.description: Custom plan override for the site, can be null

locationId.description: ID of the associated location, can be null

businessType.description: Type of business the site represents, can be null

homePageId.description: ID of the site's home page, can be null

timeZone.description: Time zone for the site, can be null

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace this site belongs to, can be null

logoMedia.description: Logo media for the site, can be null

socialIcons.description: Social media icons configuration, can be null

items.description: Array of sites in the current page of results

total.description: Total number of sites matching the query

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more pages after the current one

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there are previous pages before the current one

startCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the first item in the current page, if available

endCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the last item in the current page, if available

parameters.description: Pagination cursor

parameters.description: Search term for contacts

parameters.description: Filter by marketing status

parameters.description: Enable segmentation filters

parameters.description: Filter contacts with ratings

parameters.description: Filter contacts with appointments

parameters.description: Filter contacts with orders

parameters.description: Filter contacts with invoices

parameters.description: Filter contacts with quotes

parameters.description: Filter contacts with payments

parameters.description: Filter contacts created after date

email.description: Email address of the contact, can be null

subscribedAt.description: Timestamp when the contact subscribed, can be null
